statements: SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM DemandResponsePrograms;
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, energy_storage_capacity FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_storage_capacity FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE energy_storage_capacity > 1000;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date, energy_storage_capacity FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_storage_capacity FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE energy_storage_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY energy_storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_storage_capacity FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01' AND energy_storage_capacity < 500 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Demand_Response_Programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM Demand_Response_Programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Stored_Energy WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT energy_source, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM Stored_Energy GROUP BY energy_source;
SELECT * FROM Stored_Energy ORDER BY energy_amount DESC, storage_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Demand_Response_Programs ORDER BY program_id DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Demand_Response_Programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Demand_Response_Programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM Demand_Response_Programs JOIN Stored_Energy ON Demand_Response_Programs.program_id = Stored_Energy.energy_id;

SELECT program_name, energy_source, energy_amount, storage_location FROM Demand_Response_Programs JOIN Stored_Energy ON Demand_Response_Programs.program_id = Stored_Energy.energy_id WHERE energy_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms
SELECT program_name, energy_source, start_date FROM DemandResponsePrograms
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, energy_usage FROM ProgramParticipants
SELECT storage_name, capacity, location FROM EnergyStorage
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE energy_source = 'Solar'
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM DemandResponsePrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT storage_name, capacity, location, last_inspection FROM EnergyStorage WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY last_inspection ASC;
SELECT participant_name, energy_usage, participation_status FROM ProgramParticipants WHERE participation_status = 'Active';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, energy_source FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY program_name;
SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_source FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program;
SELECT * FROM participant WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, energy_usage, program_name FROM participant JOIN program ON participant.program_id = program.program_id;
SELECT storage_location, capacity, stored_energy FROM energy_storage WHERE stored_energy < capacity / 2;
SELECT * FROM program;
SELECT participant_name, energy_usage FROM participant WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program WHERE end_date > NOW() ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM event WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT storage_location, capacity, stored_energy FROM energy_storage WHERE stored_energy > capacity * 0.8;
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms;
SELECT drp_id, drp_name FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE drp_id = 1;
SELECT es_name, capacity FROM EnergyStorageSystems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT participant_name, address, phone_number FROM Participants WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE drp_id = 1;
SELECT drp_name, description FROM DemandResponsePrograms ORDER BY drp_name DESC;
SELECT es_name, capacity FROM EnergyStorageSystems WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY es_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, address, phone_number FROM Participants WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
